ChannelId.label: ChannelId
ChannelId.tooltip: The Channel-ID of your Twitch-Channel (See links below how to get it)

AppClientId.label: AppClientId
AppClientId.tooltip: The App ClientId of your Twitch App (get it from https://dev.twitch.tv/console/apps)

AppSecret.label: AppSecret
AppSecret.tooltip: The App Secret of your Twitch App (get it from https://dev.twitch.tv/console/apps)

LinkChannelId.label: Get your Channel-ID
LinkChannelId.tooltip: Opens https://www.streamweasels.com/tools/convert-twitch-username-to-user-id/ in the default browser to get your Channel ID

LinkDevDashboard.label: Twitch Dev-Dashboard
LinkDevDashboard.tooltip: Opens https://dev.twitch.tv/console/apps in the default browser to get your App-Information
